name: International Tin Association
goal:
The International Tin Association (formerly ITRI Ltd) is the only organisation dedicated to supporting the tin industry and expanding tin use. A primary goal is to ensure an innovative, competitive, and sustainable supply chain and market for tin.

We are a focal point for discussion and action on important regional and global issues affecting the tin industry, promoting the industry worldwide, providing authority, leadership and voice.

Our remit covers, market analysis, responsible tin supply, new tin technologies and securing tin supply for the future.
interests: Communication, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade
